text: And thou shalt remember all the way through which the Lord thy God hath brought thee for forty years through the desert, to afflict thee and to prove thee, and that the things that were known in thy heart might be made known, whether thou wouldst keep his commandments or not.

segments.text: And thou shalt remember all the way through which the Lord thy God hath brought thee for
forty years through the desert, to afflict thee and to prove thee, and that the things
that were known in thy heart might be made known, whether thou wouldst keep his commandments
